Articles.Content:
**KSP Version:** Version 1.0.2 Windows 32-bit.

**What Happens:** Cannot disable Surface FX from the settings menu.

**Mods / Add-Ons:** All Stock

**Fixes/Workarounds:**

- Changing the option to false in settings.cfg works permanently.

Good catch, marking as a bug, but please be aware that this is the support forum and all bugs should be reported on the [**Squad bug tracker**](http://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/) as they won't be addressed here.
This bug also happens under Linux Version 1.0.2 Windows 32-bit, all stock.
